reviews.review: its a fun game to play with your friends.
At first I wasn't very Counter-Strike: Source. But then it happens! This game has a test of time, and if you make it, well!
я коечно понимаю что в CS:GO лучше графика,дополнительные режимы игры но source как то роднее что-ли
If you want to know what a true E-Sport is play this game it's not only a great compatitive game but just a fun kick around game as well if you wanna just go kill fuckers on a pub server for a hour.

To be fair i only got this game because i could have more things to do in garry's mod. But its still a very fun game but with alot of people who take the game way to seriously. Ive only played it for a couple of mins but its still very fun at the least.





8/10

Para personas con una computadora regular es un muy buen juego, Prefiero jugar este juego porque mi computadora es un poco lenta y no puedo instalar el GO en mi PC porque va muy lento, asi que la mejor solución para mi es el Source y es muy bueno, lo recomiendo :)

For a lor of people who have an average PC it's a great game, I rather play this game in my computer that is a bit slow because I can't install GO in my PC because it runs really slow, so the best way to deal with it is to install Source and it's really good, I recommend it :)
Consiglio di giocare ai server con la modalità zombie :D
si porque esta bastante guapo y las armas estan chulas

Гениально!Гениально! А что ещё можно было ожидать от Valve ? Оружия - море! Режимов игры- океан , каких режимов только нет - Deathmatch , Обычный , Зомби , Прятки , Гонка за оружие( Gungame) , Прохождение . Это не только тактический , но и массовый экшн( Вмещает до 64 игроков!) . Оффициальные карты - просто шедевр , продуманы до мельчайших подробностей. Графика даже для сегодняшних дней - улётная . Такой экшен - мир геймеров врятли забудет . Оценка 9/10 - бал снял потому , что не очень удобный  *бой на ножах * , а остальное всё прелестно .
Aprendes mucho con este juego! esta muy bueno, lo recomiendo! :3
jaa klar das is ein fett geiles spiel haha
Casi todo el mundo juega y está muy guapo
Это офигенная игра, которая будет на века!
Counterstrike: source of many hours of fun.  I recommend this game to everyone.

На мой взгляд лучшая часть серии Counter-Strike-ов. Введение в неё некоторых фишек из КС ГО вернуло бы многих игроков обратно.
9.9/10
сочетает в себе триумфальную командную слаженность «Counter-Strike» с передовой технологией Source™. Обладающий соответствующей последним достижениям технической мысли графикой
Love this game! highly reccomend it!
It's a pretty good game. Good game to start off with when being a newbie to Steam.

pisse fedt så du må hellere prepare dit numeshår
One of the best games I have played in the series, Source features popular weapons, fun and popular maps, and an easy system of controls.

Es war einmal..
ein gutes CS, meiner Meinung nach, seit dem CS:S Update vom 2010, hat sich einiges getan und das nicht im positiven sinne.
Selbst nach einigen Fixes, hat es nicht mehr das alte Gefühl hervorgerufen, das man von CS:S gewohnt war.
Wer mir nicht ganz folgen kann, sollte sich das alte CS:S mal besorgen oder CS 1.6 spielen, es ist nicht das selbe.
Eine gute alternative dagegen finde ich ist CS:GO, es kommt dem alten CS:S ganz nahe, es ist aktuell und gut spielbar.
This is great game for the person who enjoys mods in games like myself or for the casual counterstike fan.
Cornerstone of PC gaming. This should be in every gamer's library. Nuff said.
Einfach ein Klassiker! Super Spiel, Grafik überaus in Ordnung und immer noch massig Server! Klare Kaufempfehlung!
Very good valve!thanks for you games we love VALVE!
One of the easiests CS games to get back into.
Ну кто не знаком с СSS? Кто не знаком бегите покупать!

This game is slightly out-dated since the counter-strike GO was recently released. all of those who purchased this game, should switch with the band-wagon to the latest CS game! It is superior in quality and gameplay!

A community of arrogant, self-absorbed, intolerant, Do-it-our-way-or-get-the-fuck-out mindtracked simpletons that have AWP and Deagle purchases bound to a key alongside their bunnyhopping scripts may (severely) cloud what is a mediocre game at best.  The hitboxes are horridly broken, as is ANY sort of weapon balance.  If you want a far better looking, playing, sounding, and outright refined experience that feels like it wasn't precariously built on a house of cards being held up by jenga blocks with the community equivilant of a white supremacist-nazi group, just get Global Offensive.  The only thing this game is good for are the textures that most maps in Gmod use.
dis one is gud cez it be like my hood, fast paced with guns ;)
This game is good but its not good because theres alot of pros and its hard to play as a newbie.
I THINK THE GAME IS REALLY good and worth it on pcs thank you very much steam

9/10
Amazingly fun game. Zombie modes are the best and always keep you interested with new maps and people to play with.
